EweMove Description S2 Description:
Cash Buyers... You could pounce super quick on this flat with No Chain, it's new kitchen and bathroom leaves a blank canvas for your personal touches. It comes with a rare 2 car parking spaces, communal rear gardens and a 68 year lease. Could be a great investment!

Set nicely tucked within the ever popular Marley Fields development just on the outskirts of Leighton Buzzard, this is a commuter's paradise with link roads in easy reach to all directions and close to Leighton Buzzard train station.

This spacious apartment provides you with two double bedrooms, a lovely large lounge/diner, a separate recently re-fitted kitchen and a brand-new bathroom.

Through the front door, your inner hallway leads to it's rooms, starting with the nicely sized and impressive bathroom.

Next, you have the master bedroom which is a great size, with fitted wardrobes and views over the communal gardens to the rear. The second double bedroom, which is currently utilised as a home office, sits opposite the bathroom

Carrying on through to the end of the hallway and you're welcomed with a large living room/diner. The bay window is a nice feature which really helps to brighten up the room. There is ample space for sofas and a dining table.

The great thing about this apartment is the separate kitchen ensuring two very distinct rooms for everyday use. Separated from the living room /diner by a door, the kitchen is in great condition nicely tiled with a good range of units present along with space for all your appliances. A window to the side adds natural light to the room.

Outside you have the communal gardens and 2 allocated parking spaces.

Please take the time to study our 2D and 3D floor plans and browse our photographs. This is a great apartment on great terms so please contact EweMove Leighton Buzzard 24/7 by telephone or online to secure your viewing.

EweMove Description S2 Description:
WATCHING THE SHIPS ROLL IN - from your very own lounge no need to go down to the bay. This split-level, two storey semi-detached home is in the highly sought-after area of Blundellsands, with FOUR DOUBLE bedrooms, a substantial DRIVEWAY for 4-5 cars, detached GARAGE and SEA VIEWS. Entering through the porch to an elegant and spacious hallway. On the ground floor you will find a double bedroom with en-suite shower, a further double bedroom and utility/laundry room with access through to the rear garden and detached garage. This home really makes the most of the sea- views with the lounge (and kitchen diner) located on the first floor plus two large Juliet style balcony doors in the lounge. With a further two double bedrooms on the second floor and modern family bathroom. CALL 24/7 to book a viewing.

Outside to the front is a long-curved driveway for 4-5 cars and grassed lawns. To the side the Driveway continues with large wooden gates through to detached garage and easy maintenance pebble garden with decked sun patio.

Blundellsands is both prestigious and popular area, offering facilities such as the West Lancashire Golf Club and Waterloo Rugby club. Also award-winning Crosby beach featuring Anthony Gormley's 'Another Place' statues plus numerous parks within the local area. An L23 postcode is also attractive due to the highly sought after primary and secondary schools nearby. You have the bustling Coronation Road and College Road close by with their independent shops, cafes and restaurants.

EweMove Description S2 Description:
EweMove Hampstead - A rare opportunity to acquire a large link detached five bed, two bath FREEHOLD family home situated on a quiet tree lined residential street within walking distance to the shops, restaurants & leisure facilities on offer in Hendon. The house is bright & light, approx 1921 sq ft / 178 sq m and a lovely tranquil 80 ft garden. Just had a new front door & the exterior painted. Off street parking for 2 cars & a garage - essential in London

The property is ideally located close to Brent Cross Shopping Centre which possesses excellent amenities, conveniences, shops & eateries, not to mention the unprecedented transport links via the Hendon Central Northern Line Tube, Overground, Thameslink & multiple bus services and direct London airport connections.

The detached period property boasts spacious & bright accommodation throughout. With a large reception room / dining area set within an open plan setting all leading out to the immaculately kept garden which offers fantastic outdoor dining opportunities. The garden has both paved & landscaped sections.

The property is only a few minutes walk from the local Sunnyhill Park which has a lovely cafe and is great for young families & dogs. 10 minutes walk to Saracens / Metro Golf / Copthall Swimming Pool. Fitness gym available at Middx University Campus & at Copthall. Shaftesbury Barnet Harriers is one of the few athletics clubs in England with the full Clubmark status and is based at Allianz Park.

With a large footprint this house will provide lots of space for a growing family. A peaceful stunning loft bedroom with an ensuite bathroom will be a refuge for the parents.

The kitchen & the rear of the property have the potential for extension subject to planning regulations. Also a large free standing garden room / office at the end of the garden would be a great addition.

Close to outstanding schools (Ofsted) & places of worship

Please do have a look at the 2D & 3D floor plans. The garden has the potential for a home office & beautifully designed bespoke rooms are available from Hub Garden Rooms.

Please contact EweMove Sales & Lettings for further details & note for legal reasons we declare sole interest in this property.

EweMove Description S2 Description:
For anyone looking for a family home in South Cerney, this is an ideal property with possibilities to add even more space if required by converting the garage (which was part of a two-storey extension by the current owners in 2005). To the front of the house, there is driveway parking for 3 cars, or 4 depending on size and access to the rear garden via a side path and gate.

Step through the entrance porch to the house and there is a welcoming hallway and a downstairs WC. Off to the left, you'll find the 6m long lounge/dining room spanning from the front to the back of the house creating a lovely social living space with an electric feature fireplace. The front portion of the room is perfect for a couple of decent size sofas and a TV unit whilst the rear section will comfortably fit a table seating 6 people and a neat little serving hatch through to the kitchen. From here there is also a door to the study as well as a glazed door leading to the conservatory and garden beyond.

Back through the hallway and the kitchen is positioned at the rear of the house with a side door giving access to the side path and garden. There are plenty of fitted cupboards within the custom-built shaker style kitchen coupled with solid wood worktops creating a lovely country style. There is space for a freestanding fridge/freezer, freestanding cooker, a ceramic sink, plumbing for a washing machine and dishwasher as well as a very useful understairs storage cupboard.

Heading up to the first floor there are four bedrooms and two bathrooms. The master bedroom suite occupies the top half of the two storey extension so is a superb size. The bedroom area has space for a bed with bedside units as well as a bank of custom built fitted wardrobes and drawers. The ensuite shower room features a window to the front, WC, basin and a double width walk in shower. Bedroom two faces the front of the house and is a comfortable double size whilst bedrooms three and four at the rear are equal sizes making great children's rooms with space for a bed, wardrobes and a desk. The family bathroom has a window to the front, jacuzzi bath with a shower over, WC, basin and an airing cupboard housing the central heating boiler.

Outside, the rear garden has a very secluded feel and offers a great opportunity for further extension to the house (subject to planning consent) without compromising much of the usable space. There is a gravelled patio area, lawn and a very decent garden shed with light and power.

South Cerney has a host of fantastic local amenities including three pubs, Indian restaurant, sandwich shop, fish & chip shop, chemist, doctor surgery, vets, village hall, two churches, Anne Edwards primary school, pre-school playgroup, a Premier and a Co-Op. That's in addition to being in the heart of the Cotswold Water Park with countless lakes for all varieties of water sports with water skiing and waterside dining at the Lakeside Brasserie.

EweMove Description S2 Description:
The picturesque rural village of Firbeck is the amazing location for this large 4 bedroom detached dormer bungalow, boasting a great country pub and church a minutes walk away and overlooking open fields to the rear and the relaxing sound of Lamb Lane dyke gently flowing at the bottom of the garden

Kingswood Close is a stones throw away from the fantastic Black Lion pub or St Martin's church, depending on your constitution of course. The country walks from the doorstep are fabulous, you could easily walk to Langold Country Park or Roche Abbey and, for the more energetic, to Hodsock Priory to see the fabulous display of Hodsock Snowdrops in the spring.

The property itself is almost 2 properties in one, downstairs it's a fully functioning bungalow and upstairs there are 2 more bedrooms and a bathroom, it's in good condition but does need updating to achieve the style you're looking for, but there is no doubt this can be a forever home in no time at all.

The property begins with a large hallway and open staircase, the lounge and dining room are open plan with the lounge at the front and the dining room at the rear with doors opening onto the large paved patio and the large lawn down to the stream.

The kitchen is a good size and well equipped with lots of cupboard space in oak, it is also served by a large utility room just outside at the back of the garage.

There are 2 double bedrooms and a family bathroom downstairs and the 2 main bedrooms and another bathroom are upstairs.

Outside is a stone built outbuilding with 2 separate areas for all your gardening gear and much more. The rear garden has the advantage of stunning rear views across the stream to the open fields beyond and the south facing aspect of the rear garden is so good that there is an electric sun canopy for those blistering summer days to come.

The local area boasts everything you could need, supermarkets within a five-minute drive, or even better just a little further you have the towns of Tickhill and Bawtry for your real local shops of quality and individuality. Commuting is within easy reach, the M1, M18 and A1 all around a ten-minute drive.

EweMove Description S2 Description:
EweMove - Detached family home in a desirable rural village. Modernised by the current owners with under floor heating in the kitchen, entrance hall, living room, dining room, bathroom and en suite. The rear garden is south/west facing, off road driveway parking for three cars and a garage.

The property is accessed via a storm porch and leads to the entrance hall. The entrance hall has porcelain tiles and under floor heating, providing access to the kitchen, living room, play room, cloakroom and stairs to the first floor.

The living room enjoys a rear aspect with french doors leading to the garden, porcelain tiles, under floor heating, flat ceilings and lights on a dimmer switch. The dining room is accessed off the living room and is perfect for entertaining, rear and side aspect double glazed windows, porcelain tiles, under floor heating, flat ceilings and lights on a dimmer switch.

The kitchen has a front aspect double glazed window, a range of eye level and base units, corner unit with storage optimiser, rolled edge work surfaces, inset Cooke & Lewis black sink, part tiled walls, fully tiled floor with under floor heating, Bosch electric oven with matching black four ring gas hob and black extractor over. Integrated fridge freezer and dishwasher, wine rack, wall mounted boiler, inset lighting in kick boards, under unit lighting and side aspect double glazed door leading to the driveway.

The cloakroom has a front aspect double glazed window, fully tiled walls and floor, low level W/C and wall hung hand wash basin.

The reception room is currently being used as a play room, however would be ideal for a study, front aspect double glazed window, under floor heating and under stairs cupboard.

The first floor landing is bright and airy, side aspect double glazed window, doors leading to all the bedrooms, family bathroom, airing cupboard and loft hatch.

Bedroom one has a rear aspect double glazed window, triple built in wardrobes, flat ceilings and lights on a dimmer switch and a door leading to the en suite. The en suite has a side aspect double glazed window, fully tiled walls, fully tiled floor with under floor heating, feature wall hung radiator, low level W/C, hand wash basin with vanity unit under, shower with rain cloud, multi function jets and a hand held shower, down lighting and extractor.

Bedroom two has a front aspect double glazed windows, built in double wardrobes and flat ceilings and lights on a dimmer switch. Bedroom three has a rear aspect double glazed window flat ceilings and lights on a dimmer switch.

The family bathroom has a front aspect double glazed window, fully tiled walls, fully tiled floors with under floor heating, double width wall hung sink with vanity unit under, low level W/C, feature wall hung radiator, flat ceilings and down lighting.

The current owners have upgraded the bathroom, en suite and cloakroom, replaced all door handles, plugs and switches. Each room has multiple in-wall USB plug sockets and the entire house has a wireless, smart heating and water system which can be linked to any smart device. The loft hatch has been replaced and made bigger providing easier access and use, fully boarded and insulated, ladder and lights.

Externally the property has off road driveway parking for three cars, a single garage with power and lights and storage in the roof space, side aspect door leading to the garden. The rear garden is south/west facing, patio area and enclosed by wooden panel fencing.

The property is situated in the desirable village of Charter Alley, about 6 miles North West of Basingstoke train station. There is a wide host of schools in the area, both private and state, primary and secondary, The Priory School is situated one mile away and Whitethorne House falls within the catchment. Basingstoke, Newbury and Reading all offer comprehensive facilities and are within driving distance. There are excellent commuter links to London by rail via Basingstoke Station (Waterloo) or by road via the M4 or M3.

EweMove Description S1 Features:

  • Separate fully enclosed Office

EweMove Description S2 Description:
A great example of a period cottage, lovingly restored to a vibrant family home. A unique property, blending together old and new in perfect style

As we approach the property, to the left is the Garage, kitted out as an office at present with a window and door to gain access from the garden. The office is an excellent extension of the house with down lighters and electric sockets, fully alarmed, insulated, plastered and its own fuseboard, an excellent opportunity work from home! In front of the garage there is off road parking for two cars. The front garden is neatly block paved allowing off road parking if required.

Into the hallway and to the right is the Living Room. A modern, light and airy room with plenty of character. The focal point of the room has to be the fireplace, creating a cosy space for the family to relax in. Contemporary decor and original beams complete the look of the room.

Through into the Kitchen Diner, in here we find a spacious room, with uPVC patio doors overlooking the rear garden. The Kitchen area has a good range of New Ivory wall and base units, complete with a new appliances including a 4 ring free standing gas hob electric oven. Integrated dishwasher /washing machine/ microwave, complemented by a wood effect vinyl flooring and fabulous granite & solid oak worktop. Plenty of space for a large family dining table.

Upstairs to the first floor and the modern decorated hallway, gives access to the three Bedrooms and Bathroom.

The Master Bedroom sits at the rear of the home and has the benefit of two windows making it light and airy. A spacious, modern room that can happily accommodate a Super King Size bed, along with additional wardrobe furniture.

Bedroom 2 is another double room. It has a window overlooking the front aspect of the property, plenty of space for a double bed, wardrobes and dressing table.

Bedroom 3 is a single room, with plenty of space for a single bed and wardrobe furniture. Carpeted

The modern bathroom has a separate shower cubicle with a mixer tap fed from the boiler, complemented by a modern white 3 piece suite. Cream wall tiles and a tile effect contemporary vinyl flooring.

To the rear, the South facing garden has an grassed area and is fully enclosed, making it a safe place for the children to play, or to just sit and relax during the warmer months in this quiet and secluded area.

The windows are hardwood double glazed, painted in a beautiful Grey colour. The rear patio doors being white UPVC

So, if you are looking for a 3 Bedroom Character Cottage, then we believe that you may have just found it.

Please take a look at our 2D and 3D colour floorplans and if you think that this property ticks all of your boxes, then call or go online to book a viewing and we can show you around at your convenience.

  • 3 D Virtual Walkthrough Available - Book Yours With Us Today!
EweMove Description S2 Description:
This stunning semi-detached house boasts three double bedrooms - Master has the luxury of an ensuite shower room - a good size lounge, modern kitchen/diner, garden room, downstairs cloakroom, a family bathroom, good size garden to the rear, an integral garage and driveway parking for 1 car.

Wow! Make this stunning 3 bed property your new family home. It's clear to see how much love and thought the present owners have put into creating this fabulous home. Every room has been neutrally and tastefully decorated and it is ready for someone new to simply move in, unpack and enjoy! Could this be you?

The front of the property is low maintenance. Mature shrubs add a splash of colour to the side. There is a driveway providing parking for 1 car and an integral single garage if undercover parking is required. There is a gate to give access to the rear and a footpath leads to the front door.

Step inside the beautifully styled entrance hall. The stairs to the first floor are straight ahead. There is a very handy storage cupboard for all your household goods. Doors lead to the kitchen/diner, cloakroom and lounge.

The kitchen/diner has an excellent range of modern white high gloss fitted wall and base units with contrasting countertops. Integrated appliances include a an eye level double oven, dishwasher and washer/dryer. There is a 5 ring gas hob with a stainless steel overhead extractor fan. There is a mobile breakfast bar/island that can be moved around to suit your needs and provides an area to dine with family and friends.

The lounge is a good size giving you plenty of options to set out your furniture as you please. Double doors lead through to the garden room.

The garden room is a fabulous space allowing you to sit and enjoy the views of the garden come rain or shine. The current owners use this space not only to dine in but to sit back, relax and unwind. Double doors open out to the rear garden.

The garden is a good size and can be enjoyed by all members of the family no matter what their age. There are two areas of patio - one ideal for alfresco dining in the warmer months and the remainder is laid to lawn. Mature hedging and trees add interest to the borders with timber fencing marking the boundary and providing privacy.

Last but by no means least to the ground floor is the cloakroom - a big tick in the box on many buyers wish lists!

To the first floor are three bedrooms and the family bathroom.

All three bedrooms are doubles and the Master bed has the luxury of its own ensuite shower room.

The family bathroom has a white suite and comprises of a bath with the convenience of an overhead shower, a wash hand basin and WC.

Please take a moment to study our 2 D and 3 D colour floor plans and browse through our photographs. Book your 3 D virtual tour with us today and let us walk/talk you through this property from the comfort and safety of your own home.

EweMove Description S2 Description:
SEMI-DETACHED FAMILY HOME IN A MOST SOUGHT AFTER CUL-DE-SAC LOCATION. Enjoying a prime residential position at the entrance to Snowdrop Close off Mercer Crescent is this EXCELLENT DORMER -STYLE HOUSE. Situated within a short walking distance of the popular Helmshore Primary School...

...the property is also well placed for Broadway with a good range of local shops,bus services and access to Haslingden High School & Sixth Form College. The Bent Gate Roundabout is within a short mile drive for the link to the A56 and M66/M60 and M65/M6 motorway networks beyond.

The attractive and well proportioned THREE BEDROOM accommodation features a generous front lounge, central fitted 'living' breakfast kitchen and adaptable rear conservatory presently utilised as a dining room.The first floor offers two double and one single bedrooms (two with custom fitted wardrobes) and a modern white bathroom/w.c with thermostatic controlled shower over a 'P' shaped bath.

To the outside,there are low maintenance garden areas to both the front and rear and a two car width, block paved driveway . The driveway also extends along the gable elevation to double gates. A detached single garage with power & light is situated to the rear with a secluded seating area/patio and artificial turf laid ,fully enclosed garden.
